waitlist.header: You're in a Steamder, but still in the waiting room! Here are your potential gaming buddies. We're just waiting for the admin (the profile with the little crown) to start, then you can begin picking games!

informations.waiting: Waiting for <1>{{ username }}</1> to start the Steamder...

actions.leave_confirm: You're the Steamder admin. If you leave, the Steamder will be cancelled. Are you sure you want to leave?
actions.switch: Take all games instead of just the common ones
actions.switch_tooltip: In the end, it will show which player does not have the selected game, along with a link to the store page

kick.title: üõë Kick a player
kick.content: Are you sure you want to kick <1>{{ username }}</1> from the Steamder?

leave.title: üö™ Leave the Steamder
leave.warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING !! You are this Steamder's admin. If you leave, the Steamder will be cancelled for everyone.
leave.content: Are you sure you want to leave?

errors.not_enough_players: You need at least two players to start a Steamder!
errors.not_matching: {{ player1 }} and {{ player2 }} do not have any games in common!

game.content: The games will pass one after the other. Like the ones you want, skip the ones you don't want to play. The first game liked by everyone in the <1>Steamder</1> will appear. You can cancel a liked game by clicking on it in the small box on the right. If no jointly liked game is decided after the countdown, a random game will emerge! <1>It's time to end the debate!</1>

result.you_dont_have: It seems you don't have this game ! ...
result.players_dont_have: The following players don't have this game :
